snippet.title: Top 20 Creepiest Documentaries of the Century So Far
snippet.description:
Reality can be far more disturbing than fiction. Join us as we count down our picks for the most chilling documentaries released since the new millennium. From sleep paralysis nightmares to internet rabbit holes that led to tragedy, these films expose the darkest corners of humanity. Which documentary sends the most chills down your spine? Our countdown includes "Capturing the Friedmans" (2003), "Dear Zachary" (2008), "The Act of Killing" (2012), "Abducted in Plain Sight" (2017), "Mommy Dead and Dearest" (2017), "The Nightmare" (2015), "Tickled" (2016), "Jesus Camp" (2006), "The Bridge" (2006), and more disturbing real-life stories that will haunt your thoughts long after watching. What's the creepiest documentary you've ever seen? Let us know in the comments.
